title: Charlie's Angels Logo
author: kiarostami

comments.content:
**[Futura Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234815/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=FuturaBlack%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=04e42788b888f0c759e01b7bf0b65dfc&fsize=60&text=CHARLIE%20ANGELS&wrap=2)** by Paul Renner available from Linotype, Bitstream, URW++, E&F + others.  
It's also copied by many well known font forgery companies under a lot of different names.

[revised text: Fivos Vilanakis found your font.]  
Here is an alternate title using Lee Bold designed by Leo Weisz in 1974 for VGC (Visuals Graphic Corporation):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LeeBoldByLeoWeisczInCharliesAngels_4023.jpg)
  
See also Dan X. Solos fonts in the Dover Moderne Display Fonts CD-ROM & Book, where it is sold as Lester Bold.  
Don
